wedo_instance.title: WeDo Template: Heartwood Glossary Schema
wedo_instance.description: Governs the definition of the 'modifying words' that shape agent behavior and swarm alignment.

rules.versioning: The Heartwood MUST include a version number (e.g., V1.1) in the metadata and title.
rules.modifying_definitions: Definitions must explicitly state how the word changes the agent's behavior or processing mode.
rules.interlinking: Each definition should mention at least one other glossary term that works in tandem with it.
rules.legislative_fidelity: Terms must be mapped to their role in the MetaGit (Wood), Nervous System (Nerves), or User Interface (Paper).
rules.communication_examples: Include documented examples with actual text and ![]() image links to journal artifacts.
rules.output_location: All active task instances and WeDo reports MUST reside in the day's temporal json/wedo/ directory. md/wedo/ is for archival/deprecated narrative only.
rules.finalization_protocol: The goal is to refine 'md/wedo/' artifacts into permanent Heartwood in 'md/'. This transition (and renaming) occurs ONLY upon an explicit 'straightup' request from the user (HAM prompt).

structure.term: The word or phrase being defined.
structure.modification: How this word modifies the agent's behavior.
